name: Sunday Afternoons Daydream Bucket Hat - Women's
description:
When the sun is shining and you can't decide on a look, this reversible bucket hat gives you options. The removeable chinstrap lets you secure it on blustery days, or wear it without. Throw it in your pack for your next outing – the crushable design folds up for easy travel.Light nylon and polyester fabric has UPF 50+ sun protection.Fabric has a DWR finish to shed light rain.7cm brim shelters your eyes.Sunglass Lock™ keeps them in place when not on your face.Reversible design lets you change up your look.Hand wash cold, do not bleach, line dry, do not iron, do not dry clean.

        Sustainability
